attributes.action: Charter a plane to Bring back UK nationals from Bangkok (Nov / Dec 2008)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lack of information from the British government and British embassy over the escalting Thai airport crisis has been disconcerting.  As other countries are being repatriated by their goverments Brits are becoming more and more frustrated at the lack of information and initiative from th British Embassy in Thailand to repatriate their citizens (NB, the British Embassy in Thailand is only open from Mon - Thurs)

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
